description:
Seamless data capture

DMT MyoNORM is a simple multi-platform (Win/Mac) free application that allows you to calculate optimal length/tension relationship of small arteries.
The normalization is important as
- it standardizes baseline experimental conditions allowing for direct comparison of vessels
- it optimizes vessel response
- the sensitivity of the vessel to agonists is stretch dependent
- the vesselâ€™s active response is stretch dependent
- it allows the user to assess the viability of the tissue
